data.actual_result: The drag and drop animation and notification is shown but it does not actually load the image to upload.
data.expected_result: The image should be loaded to Discord and be ready to upload.
data.short_description: Can't upload files via drag and drop when searching in Spotlight.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the spotlight search menu by pressing cmd + space (or whatever you set the shortcut to) - Search for an image or file - Drag one of the image or file from the results to a Discord channel in which you're allowed to upload
